activities: InterCall provides global audio, video and web-based conferencing, as well as virtual event and streaming services for its domestic & international customers. Customer contact and account information is required for customer relationship management and billing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer contact information collected for the purpose of account support.
privacyprograms: InterCall adheres to Sarbanes Oxley standards & undergoes annual audits by independant third party auditing. InterCall pursues compliance with ISO 27001/27002 data security standards and undergoes annual audits by independant third party auditing.
recoursemech: The services of BBB EU Safe Harbor program have been employed to investigate customer complaints & provide dispute resolution.
